description.value:
Glasya, Hell's criminal mastermind, grants her tiefiings magic that is useful for committing heists.

Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 1.

Legacy of Malbolge. You know the @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.vsLp2emCFTGf811b]{Minor Illusion} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.11bf0t0xFFv4rFgo]{Disguise Self} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.ucNcJVZQ5RqyFG2e]{Invisibility} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
